10.11.18  6:07 am   I had a dream that I was at a party and you were there. We got into conversation about Buddhism (you mentioned you weren't a Buddhist and didn't really understand it), and then somebody came up and put yogurt in your hair. I got up to fight them for doing that, but you said to leave it and not worry about it. Was my dream version of you accurate, and what would you do if a stranger put yogurt in your hair?

10.11.18  3:57 am   I think I might've half-consciously limited my thought process growing up, and now I'm slowly rediscovering how my brain really works. Has this ever happened to you?

10.11.18  1:51 am   Bill, are you happy right now? These songs you've been putting out are just fantastic and they seem pretty upbeat, but I know that some of the most upbeat songs can hide a dark truth about the creator. Is that your case?

      Do these songs fulfill your spirit?

      What aspirations remain for you?

10.11.18  1:45 am   Every time I see someone playing ukulele picking style they are always using their thumb to play the strings but I have more of a "bassist" aproach to it coz I use primarily my index finger but also my other ones. Do you think this is bad?

      Is it proper technique to play it with your thumb?

      Am I a heathen?

      Should I switch techniques.

      K thx :)

10.10.18  4:26 pm   Hey bill, I think I found the key to happiness.  Well, its not really the key to happiness as much as the key to becoming happy.   Its a 5 step plan.   1. Find something that makes you happy.   2. Do said thing.   3. If you get tired of original thing, find something new before you get completely burnt out.   4. Do said new thing plus occasionally go back to old thing(s).   5. Repeat steps 1-5.    What do you think?
